channel.title: Scripting a shop need some help
channel.description:
ok. so im trying to script Naff and zaff. i have there id i have made a shop. and repacked the shops and recompiled the server they still dont do anything. here is what i have
[code]else if (npc.getId() == 546) ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 90);[/code]
what is the player 90? saying and
90 995 false - zaff battlestaves shop - 1391 1000 1393 1000 1395 1000 1397 1000 1399 1000 3053 1000 6562 1000 11736 1000 21494 1000 21495 1000 21496 1000 21497 1000 21502 1000 21504 1000 21506 1000 21777 1000
but when i trade nothing is happening??

item.title: Scripting a shop need some help
item.dc:creator: @jessessoulmate jessessoulmate
item.description:
@jessessoulmate wrote:

^ this guys is a bitch. told me pay him 5m rs cash and then he would help. i said i would after he helped me. and he was like you pay me first.
and then i was like kid i got all 99s on a rs acc with bank roll cash
and he got pissed when i told him good day. and was like imma ddos your ass.
so watch it he is a scammer guys!
